name: Ultimate salmon simulator 2019
description:
Please download the game for better performance!

It's the season again, the salmons are going upstream to reproduce... But the bears are counting on this to get some free food!!

Ultimate Salmon Simulator 2019 lets you live this legendary moment of nature, when salmons race against the current to reach their birthplace.

This game was made for the Weekly game jam 93, whose theme was "Fishing"!
It was pretty fun to work on this, and it's nice to produce something which doesn't physically hurt to look at (altough it does hurt mentally).

Human body made with MakeHuman
Bear head by printable_models
Salmon head by umar6419
Music: Interplanetary spark by SEGA
Some animations (such as running) were picked from the Unity Asset Store
